issue.title: VisualPlugins not registering SDF elements (Gazebo2, Indigo) -> (Gazebo7, Kinetic)

content.raw:
I am also having this issue on Ubuntu 16.04 / Gazebo 7.0.0 / SDFormat 4.0.0 (latest from debian). I do not understand how you resolved it simply by updating your binary releases - are you using Ubuntu?

My generated URDF->SDF [baxter.sdf](https://gist.github.com/davetcoleman/7501160a945ee1d377981800c6ea176b)
